input: I need to raise funds and hire someone to help with marketing.

response.goal_summary: Raise funds and hire a marketing professional to enhance marketing efforts.

tasks.task: Research potential investors and funding sources.
tasks.why_suggested: Identifying potential investors is crucial to securing funds.

tasks.task: Prepare a detailed business plan and pitch deck.
tasks.why_suggested: A well-prepared business plan and pitch deck are essential to attract investors.

depends_on: Research potential investors and funding sources
Prepare a detailed business plan and pitch deck
tasks.why_suggested: Direct meetings can help secure commitments from investors.

tasks.task: Follow up with investors after meetings.
tasks.why_suggested: Following up can help maintain interest and move towards securing funds.

tasks.task: Define the role and responsibilities for the marketing position.
tasks.why_suggested: Clear role definition is necessary to attract the right candidates.

tasks.task: Create a job listing and post on relevant job boards.
depends_on: Define the role and responsibilities for the marketing position
tasks.why_suggested: Posting the job is essential to reach potential candidates.

depends_on: Create a job listing and post on relevant job boards
tasks.why_suggested: Shortlisting helps focus on the most suitable candidates.
Interviews are crucial to assess candidates' fit and skills.

tasks.task: Make a hiring decision and extend an offer.
tasks.why_suggested: Extending an offer is the final step in securing a new hire.
